But as it turned out, it really wasn't a pleasant evening, and I didn't enjoy myself. On top of this, the advertisement wasn't correctright at all, or I must have been to the wrong show!

According to the advertisement, the show should have started at 19.30, but it didn't begin before 20.15. That's nearly an hour laterlate! The tickets were rather expensive, and the discounts mentionnedmentioned in the advertisement weren't at all available at the theatre. They had never heard of such a thing!
The actors were not the ones expected: there was no sign of Danny Brook, and the person who played his part was very disappointing.
I was a little hungry after the show, but then again, I had to find another restaurant since the theatre restaurant was closed with no further information given.
In conclusion, I wasn't at all satisfied, and I would like my money back since the show wasn't worth it.
